sentences.en: All the work will be published by Chinese Potters Newsletter.
sentences.cn: 两地作品由《陶艺家通讯》出专册发表.

sentences.en: BeiMacNews is the newsletter of the Beijing Macintosh Union.
sentences.cn: 《北麦刊》是北京麦金塔联盟的会刊.

sentences.en: Daniel has just got this month's Computer Club newsletter.
sentences.cn: 丹尼尔刚拿到了这个月的电脑俱乐部的时事通讯.

sentences.en: Make a hover ad for your newsletter subscription box.
sentences.cn: 在时事资讯订阅栏中,可以添加滚动的广告.

sentences.en: PETER: Well , the Newsletter is probably your best bet.
sentences.cn: 业务通讯可能是最好的方式.

sentences.en: Please read the details here in our release newsletter.
sentences.cn: 请在这里我们发布的新闻稿中阅读详细信息.

sentences.en: She is reading an article in the club newsletter.
sentences.cn: 她正在读俱乐部时事通讯上的一篇文章.

sentences.en: The meeting notes will be published in a forthcoming newsletter.
sentences.cn: 会议讨论的内容将在每周通讯上刊登.

sentences.en: The newsletter was printed towards the end of June in readiness for mailing.
sentences.cn: 快到6月底的时候，时事通讯印刷完毕准备投寄。

sentences.en: The organization now has around 18,000 members who receive a quarterly newsletter.
sentences.cn: 该组织现有大约18,000名成员，他们会收到一份内部通讯季刊。

sentences.en: The society publishes a newsletter twice a year.
sentences.cn: 该社团一年出版两次简报。

sentences.en: There are lots of phonies and charlatans in the financial newsletter business.
sentences.cn: 干金融通讯这一行的人中间不乏骗子和吹牛大王.

sentences.en: They keep in touch with their members by issuing a quarterly newsletter.
sentences.cn: 他们印发内部季刊与会员保持联系.

sentences.en: This correlation was noted in Issue 181 of this newsletter.
sentences.cn: 181期的新闻简报提及了这种联系.

sentences.en: Together with the website and E - newsletter, PD China provides multi - media and full - dimension information services.
sentences.cn: 配合网站和电子通讯(e-newsletter),《包装文摘》可为业内人士提供 全方位 的多媒体信息服务.

sentences.en: We shoved a copy of the newsletter beneath their door.
sentences.cn: 我们往他们门下塞了一份时事通讯。

trans.tran_cn: （给特定读者定期寄发的）通讯，时事通讯，业务通讯
trans.tran_en: a short written report of news about a club, organization etc that is sent regularly to people who are interested
